translation.en: [narrator] The Flounders.
A ragtag team of rejects from the Valley...
translation.fr: Une équipe de canailles de la Vallée...

translation.en: assembled for one reason
and one reason only.
-[narrator] To fail. -[thuds]
-[spits] -[narrator] But they didn't fail.
They didn't exactly succeed,
-but they didn't fail. -[Tyler grunts]
Thanks to a technicality,
they passed the Junior Rescue Training.
translation.fr:
ils ont réussi le concours
des sauveteurs juniors.

translation.en: Now, they'll be protecting the beaches of Malibu
translation.fr:
Ils vont désormais protéger
les plages de Malibu...

translation.en: from Tower Two.
translation.fr: du haut de leur Tour Deux.

translation.en: -[upbeat music playing] -[narrator] Tyler, the wise guy
translation.fr: Tyler, le mariole aux cheveux gominés.

translation.en: with the great hair.
-Gina... -[grunts]
...the tough one.
Lizzie. Spunky, with a dark side.
Dylan, the captain with a lot to prove.
translation.fr: Dylan, la capitaine qui a tout à prouver.

translation.en: Eric, the heart of the group.
translation.fr: Eric, le grand cœur du groupe.

translation.en: And... Tyler--
-[Gina] Hold on. -[cell phone beeps]
-You already said Tyler. -I did?
You started with him. It's way too much Tyler.
translation.fr: Au tout début. Il mérite pas tant.

translation.en: I think it's exactly the right amount of me.
translation.fr: C'est le minimum pour moi, je crois.

translation.en: Of course you do.
"Spunky with a dark side"? I don't see it.
translation.fr: "Téméraire au côté obscur", je saisis pas.

translation.en: Oh! Did I tell you? My dad was mowing the lawn in his bare feet and he cut off three toes.
translation.fr:
En passant la tondeuse
mon père s'est coupé trois orteils

translation.en: I asked the doctor if I could sew one on and he said maybe next time.
translation.fr:
En passant la tondeuse
mon père s'est coupé trois orteils   et le docteur me laissera les recoudre
si ça se reproduit.

translation.en: [giggling] I really hope there's a next time!
Oh. "Spunky with a dark side."
I hear it now.
Yo, Eric, I can't believe you made this. Where'd you get the footage?
translation.fr:
Eric, c'est génial.
Où t'as eu les images ?

translation.en: Vooch shot it.
I also do weddings and bar mitzvahs.
translation.fr: Je filme aussi mariages et bar mitzvahs.

translation.en: Guys, squeeze in.
I wanna get a pic of your first day as official Malibu Junior Rescue.
translation.fr:
Pour votre premier jour
chez les sauveteurs juniors.

translation.en: Everybody say, "Who's driving?"
[all] Who's driving?
Wait, who is driving?
[Dylan] Where are they?
Please, please, please, don't be late on our first day!
translation.fr: Pitié, soyez à l'heure le premier jour.

translation.en: Oh, hey, Dylan! Where's your "team"?
translation.fr: Salut, Dylan. Où est ton équipe ?

translation.en: You know... I thought I smelled Valley trash earlier,
translation.fr:
Tu sais... J'ai cru sentir
les rebuts de la vallée, mais en fait,

translation.en: but it turns out I was just walking by the dumpster.
translation.fr:
J'ai cru sentir
les rebuts de la vallée, mais en fait, ça venait de la benne à ordure.

translation.en: [laughing awkwardly] That's funny!
You know, they're on their way. Be here any second.
translation.fr:
Ils sont en route.
Ils vont arriver.

translation.en: Boop-boop! Oh, just got a text. [giggles]
-They're right around the corner. -Did you just say, "boop-boop"?
translation.fr:
- Ils sont tout près.
- T'as dit "Boop boop" ?

translation.en: No, that's the sound my phone makes when I get a text. [laughs]
translation.fr: C'est l'alerte texto de mon mobile.

translation.en: Oh, hang on, I gotta respond.
-Click, click, click, click, click... -Your phone is wack.
Just admit it, Dylan. You can't handle being a captain.
Garvin should have never given you a tower.
translation.fr:
Garvis n'aurait pas dû
te confier une tour.

translation.en: Hey, guys! Ready to save some lives?
translation.fr: Alors, prêts à sauver des vies ?

translation.en: Oh! Can you say it again? Eric's head was in the way.
Vooch has been filming us for weeks without our knowledge.
translation.fr: Vooch nous filme à notre insu.

translation.en: Oh, that's... troubling.
[gasps] All right, all right, I'm coming. I'll be right there.
translation.fr: C'est bon, j'arrive tout de suite.

translation.en: I'm so proud of you guys. Aw! Kill it today, okay?
translation.fr: Je suis fier de vous. Défoncez tout, OK ?

translation.en: No, wait!
Save it.
-["Wedding March" playing] -[bus rattling]
You guys, you're here! You're officially Malibu Junior Rescue!
translation.fr: Vous êtes là. Vous êtes sauveteurs juniors.

translation.en: -Yeah! -[chuckles] Yeah! Now what?
[Dylan] Malibu Beach.
Twenty-seven miles of the most beautiful coast in the world,
translation.fr:
Cinquante kilomètres
des plus belles plages au monde,

translation.en: and it's our job to protect all of it.
From the beach, from the water, from the air...
translation.fr: Depuis la plage, la mer, le ciel.

translation.en: Not space. That's not really our jurisdiction.
translation.fr: L'espace n'est pas de notre ressort.

translation.en: [Brody] All right!
Welcome to the first day of Malibu Beach Junior Rescue! Come on!
translation.fr:
Accueillons les sauveteurs juniors
de Malibu Beach !

translation.en: [Brody] Now listen.
Our job is about more than just hangin' out at our towers and lookin' pretty.
translation.fr:
Il ne s'agit pas juste
de faire les beaux du haut de nos tours.

translation.en: But some of us can't help it. Am I right, Tower One?
translation.fr: Comme pour la Tour Un, non ?

translation.en: -Come on. -[Tower One cheers]
Junior Rescue also gets assignments each morning,
translation.fr: Vous aurez des missions tous les matins

translation.en: and I'm the one in charge of handing them out. [laughs]
Most are dope. Some are super lame. But they all gotta get done.
translation.fr:
Qu'elles soient cool ou naze,
il faudra les faire.

translation.en: So get pumped, Tower One, because I gave us ATV Patrol.
translation.fr:
Bonne nouvelle, Tour Un.
Vous êtes la Patrouille quad.

translation.en: -Come on! -[Tower One cheers]
Everybody else... check the board. Let's go!
translation.fr:
Les autres, consultez le tableau.
C'est parti !

translation.en: I wonder what assignment we got!
[sighs] This is an official Junior Rescue assignment?
translation.fr: C'est une mission de sauveteurs juniors ?

translation.en: I thought we were gonna rescue swimmers, scan for sharks, run in slow motion.
translation.fr:
On devait sauver les nageurs,
courir au ralenti, tout ça.

translation.en: -You know, cool stuff. -And we will.
translation.fr:
On devait sauver les nageurs,
courir au ralenti, tout ça. On le fera.

translation.en: Well, not run in slow motion. Nobody can do that.
But for right now, we have to focus on the assignment we got,
and keeping the beach clean is important.
translation.fr: car la plage doit être propre.

translation.en: I know it's not exciting or glamorous.
You guys, I just checked Instagram,
and Jiffpom was here, like, five minutes ago!
translation.fr: que Jiffpom était ici à l'instant !

translation.en: Any one of these piles could be his!
Is it just me, or are there a surprising amount of turds on this beach?
translation.fr:
Il y a vraiment plein de crottes
sur cette plage, non ?

translation.en: [Brody] Come on.
Didn't want you guys to get bored, so I restocked the beach for you, losers.
translation.fr: Pour vous occuper, j'ai amené du renfort.

translation.en: He borrowed three dogs just to mess with us, and we're losers.
translation.fr:
Il a emprunté trois chiens
juste pour nous embêter.

translation.en: [Brody] Yes, I did.
-I'm gonna handle this. -[Dylan] Tyler, stop.
Okay? it's not worth it. Just ignore him.
translation.fr: Il en vaut pas la peine. Ignore-le.

translation.en: Oh, hey, uh, watch your step, 'cause Tiger here ate a block
translation.fr:
Attention les pieds, car Tiger digère mal le cheddar
qu'il a mangé.

translation.en: of cheddar earlier, and it is not agreeing with him.
translation.fr:
car Tiger digère mal le cheddar
qu'il a mangé.

translation.en: Oh, not one bit. All right, have fun.
-That was some good poopin', you guys! -[dog barks]
[laughs] Yes, it was.
I hate that guy.
[Eric] Hand sanitizer for you, and you...
translation.fr: De l'antiseptique pour toi, et toi...

translation.en: and you, and me.
Lizzie, you want in on this?
No, thanks, I'm good.
Usually I think my mom's crazy for packing things like this...
translation.fr:
Ma mère met toujours trop de choses
dans mon sac.

translation.en: but I'm lovin' it right now.
-Uh, Dylan, can you do my back? -Yeah.
translation.fr:
- Dylan, tu m'en mets dans le dos ?
- Oui.

translation.en: Well, thanks to Brody, now I have to burn these.
translation.fr: Grâce à Brody, je dois les brûler.

translation.en: -What's his problem? -He's just trying to get to us.
translation.fr: Il cherche quoi ? À nous provoquer.

translation.en: -Well, it's working. -Look, Dylan, you're our tower captain.
translation.fr: Et ça marche. Dylan, tu es capitaine, réagis.

translation.en: -You have to do something. -I am.
translation.fr: Dylan, tu es capitaine, réagis. Bien sûr.

translation.en: I'm gonna take us back to our tower, and we're gonna forget all about Brody
translation.fr:
Retournons dans notre tour,
oublions Brody

translation.en: and focus on saving lives.
Come on, guys, let's go.
There's my least favorite tower.
translation.fr: Voilà la tour que j'aime le moins.

translation.en: -Got a couple more jobs for you guys. -But we already did all our assignments.
translation.fr: J'ai du boulot pour vous. On a fini nos tâches.

translation.en: Yeah, I know, but a couple slipped through the cracks,
translation.fr: Oui, mais je n'avais pas tout vu

translation.en: and it's up to me to make sure they get done...
translation.fr: et je dois m'assurer que ce soit fait

translation.en: by you.
Buoy maintenance?
Swim fin disinfection?
It's almost like someone's giving us the worst jobs on purpose.
translation.fr: On semble nous confier les pires tâches.

translation.en: [laughing] Yeah, it is, isn't it?
That's not fair.
But, it is hilarious.
[Brody] What can I say?
When you guys humiliated us in front of the mayor, you started a war.
translation.fr:
En nous humiliant devant le maire,
vous avez déclaré la guerre.

translation.en: You're punishing us because we saved a life?
translation.fr:
- On est punis d'avoir sauvé une vie ?
- Ben oui !

translation.en: Doy! Uh... What did you think was gonna happen?
translation.fr:
- On est punis d'avoir sauvé une vie ?
- Ben oui ! Vous espériez quoi ?

translation.en: I don't know, we'd be praised for our heroism and welcomed among you?
translation.fr: À être félicités et bien accueillis ?

translation.en: [scoffs] Well, joke's on you, brah.
You'll never be one of us.
translation.fr: Vous ne serez jamais des nôtres.

translation.en: We all agree we gotta take that guy down, right?
No, we all agree that no matter what Brody throws at us,
translation.fr: Non, car quoique Brody nous demande,

translation.en: we're gonna do such a great job that even he'll have to admit we belong here.
translation.fr:
on le fera et il verra
que notre place est ici.

translation.en: [sighs] I can't believe I'm saying this right now, but... Dylan's right.
translation.fr:
J'ai du mal à l'accepter,
mais Dylan a raison.

translation.en: We want people to respect us, we have to earn it.
Yes, exactly! Take the high road.
Come on, team. Let's go scrape barnacles off the buoys.
translation.fr:
Allons enlever les bernacles
sur les bouées.

translation.en: Taking the high road sucks.
We earned our spot here, and you're gonna let him ruin our summer?
translation.fr: Tu veux le laisser gâcher notre été ?

translation.en: Forget that. We gotta fight fire with fire.
translation.fr: Combattons le feu par le feu.

translation.en: [Dylan] What does that even mean?
It means we gotta prank Brody so hard that he'll never mess with us again.
translation.fr:
On va lui faire une blague
qu'il oubliera jamais.

translation.en: Tyler, everybody already thinks we don't deserve to be here!
translation.fr:
Tout le monde pense
qu'on mérite pas d'être ici !

translation.en: If we go after Brody instead of doing our job, it'll just prove them right.
translation.fr:
En s'acharnant sur Brody,
on leur donnera raison.

translation.en: I'm your captain, and I say we scrape buoys.
translation.fr: Le capitaine ordonne de racler les bouées.

translation.en: And I will, as soon as I'm done shutting Brody up. Trust me.
translation.fr:
Je le ferai,
dès que j'en aurai fini avec Brody.

translation.en: Tyler! [sighs]
I can't believe him! Can you believe him?
translation.fr: J'arrive pas à le croire ! Et toi ?

translation.en: Actually, I gotta go with Tyler on this one.
translation.fr: En fait, je suis d'accord avec lui.

translation.en: I mean, it's classic first day of kindergarten.
Find the biggest kid on the yard... and take her to knuckle town.
translation.fr:
On repère le plus gros,
et on lui fait sa fête.

translation.en: [knuckles crack] Then everybody knows you're no one's punk.
Sorry, Dylan!
This is crazy!
Pretty much.
Right, there's gotta be something in here I can use to prank Brody.
translation.fr:
Trouvons un truc ici
pour lui faire un canular.

translation.en: Ooh, hello.
Speargun.
-This will totally shut him up. -[fires]
Uh, maybe something less permanent.
-[grunts, groans] -[equipment jangles]
Tyler? Tyler, are you in here?
[Tyler, grunting] Over... here.
I wanna help get back at Brody.
Is it bad?
[chuckles softly] It's horrible.
Then why are you smiling?
'Cause I get to take 'em out.
No, no, no. No, no, no, no. I'm good.
I'm good. I'm good. [screams]
[Dylan] Hey. We went ahead and grouped the buoys into piles.
translation.fr: On a commencé à les regrouper.

translation.en: That's yours, that's Tyler's, that's Lizzie's.
-Where are those guys? -[Dylan] They promised me
translation.fr: Ils sont où ? Ils vont arriver après avoir fini

translation.en: they'd be right back
translation.fr: Ils vont arriver après avoir fini

translation.en: as soon as they finished doing the thing I told them not to do.
translation.fr: ce que je leur ai dit de pas faire.

translation.en: So you just let them go?
No, I didn't let them. They just... didn't listen.
translation.fr: Non. Ils m'ont juste... pas écoutée.

translation.en: Hey, that's not right. We're a team.
translation.fr: C'est pas normal. On est une équipe.

translation.en: We can't accomplish anything unless we're together.
-I'll go get them. -No, wait!
Seriously?
We can't be a team if everyone keeps leaving.
translation.fr:
On n'est pas une équipe
s'ils partent tous.

translation.en: -Why is nobody listening to me? -[Gina] Don't beat yourself up.
translation.fr:
Pourquoi personne m'écoute ? Tu n'y es pour rien
s'ils te respectent pas.

translation.en: It's not your fault the team doesn't respect you.
translation.fr:
Tu n'y es pour rien
s'ils te respectent pas.

translation.en: What, you think the team doesn't respect me?
-You think they do? -I did.
Oh...
Well, they don't.
I ran out of bandages, so I had to get creative.
translation.fr: J'ai plus de pansements, j'ai pris ça.

translation.en: Thanks, Lizzie.
Uh, missed one. [chuckles]
Let's just get the supplies to prank Brody.
translation.fr: Prenons le matériel pour piéger Brody.

translation.en: Ooh, grab that rope.
I have an idea.
Somebody's coming. We're not supposed to be in here. Hide!
[sighs] Hi, Eric.
[screams] They're alive?
I'm sorry about the mouth-to-mouth. I'd never done it before!
translation.fr:
Désolé pour le bouche-à-bouche.
J'en avais jamais fait.

translation.en: I didn't know you weren't supposed to use tongue!
translation.fr: Je voulais pas mettre la langue.

translation.en: Eric... it's me.
[chuckles sheepishly] I knew that.
You guys, Dylan, Gina, and I have been doing all the work.
translation.fr:
Dylan, Gina et moi,
on fait tout le boulot.

translation.en: You gotta come help.
We are helping. We're getting Brody to back off.
translation.fr:
On vous aide en incitant Brody
à renoncer.

translation.en: But Dylan said--
Dylan wants us to do this.
Then why did she tell you not to?
Think about it. She's the captain. She can't tell us to break the rules.
translation.fr:
Réfléchis. C'est la capitaine. Elle rappelle le règlement.
Mais elle n'aime pas Brody.

translation.en: But she doesn't like Brody any more than we do.
translation.fr:
Elle rappelle le règlement.
Mais elle n'aime pas Brody.

translation.en: -I don't know... -[Tyler] Well, I do!
-Tyler? Where are you? -[Tyler] Let's just say
I didn't jump into a bin full of fish hooks...
translation.fr:
Je suis pas tombé dans la caisse
d'hameçons,

translation.en: [groaning] ...and I definitely didn't do it twice.
[whispers] Yes, he did.
Then, how am I supposed to get everyone to respect me as the captain?
First, stop asking questions like that. Captains don't ask.
translation.fr: Commence par éviter ce genre de questions.

translation.en: Okay, let's say you were captain. How would you--
translation.fr:
Imagine que tu es capitaine.
Comment...

translation.en: You're asking again.
[scoffs] When was the last time anybody cleaned these things?
translation.fr:
Ces trucs n'ont pas été lavés
depuis quand ?

translation.en: Half my team has bailed on me, Brody thinks I'm a joke...
translation.fr:
La moitié du groupe me plante.
Brody se moque de moi.

translation.en: Maybe I'm not cut out for this.
translation.fr: Je suis pas faite pour ça.

translation.en: Gross.
You're right. Doubting yourself is gross!
translation.fr: Oui, c'est dég de douter de soi.

translation.en: [sighs] But how can I not?
I mean, I've been here three summers. I know Junior Rescue inside and out.
translation.fr:
C'est mon troisième été.
Je connais tout ici.

translation.en: I even made captain. Everyone still walks all over me.
translation.fr:
Je suis capitaine,
et on me marche dessus.

translation.en: You better figure it out fast, 'cause we're the only ones working,
translation.fr:
Trouve une solution,
car on est deux à bosser

translation.en: and these fins are disgusting.
-[ominous cello music playing] -Ew! What is that? Eel barf?
translation.fr: C'est quoi ça ? Du vomi d'anguille ?

translation.en: -[creature snarls] -[gasps] Something in here just moved!
What is that?
Wait. Those look like tentacles.
-[ominous music grows louder] -Is that what I think it is?
You guys know you got stuff all over your face, right? [snickers]
translation.fr:
Vous êtes toutes barbouillées,
vous savez ?

translation.en: That's it! I'm not doing this all summer! I'm taking him down.
translation.fr: Ça suffit. Je tiendrai pas tout l'été. Je vais l'anéantir.

translation.en: Gina, wait!
When Brody comes back to Tower One, he'll step into this net.
Which is attached to that parasail.
All of which is attached to that Polaris.
I'll drive off, dragging Brody across Dog Beach,
translation.fr: En le traînant sur la plage des chiens,

translation.en: the parasail will open, lifting him into the air and out over the ocean.
translation.fr:
la paravoile s'ouvrira
en l'embarquant vers l'océan.

translation.en: Then we'll release the rope, and kersploosh!
translation.fr: On lâche la corde et plouf !

translation.en: You can say "kersploosh, kersplat, kersplunk." It's still a ker-felony!
translation.fr:
Tu peux dire "plouf, flic, flac, floc,"
ça reste un délit !

translation.en: This is crazy!
Is it crazy or is it crazy?
I'm not hearing the difference.
-Eric, we're doing this for the team. -What team?
Ever since you decided to prank Brody, we haven't been a team.
translation.fr:
Depuis que tu veux piéger Brody,
il n'y en a plus.

translation.en: Somebody had to do something. Dylan didn't have a plan.
Yes, she did. You just didn't give it a chance.
You ignored her.
I didn't mean to.
Well, you did.
It's our first day, and we're already falling apart.
translation.fr: Dès le premier jour, on se déchire.

translation.en: Don't you get it?
This is exactly what Brody wants.
You're right.
Are you serious? We're bailing?
Yeah. We should be helping our team.
I'll take the Polaris back. Follow me, and you guys untie the net.
translation.fr: Je ramène le ranger. Détachez le filet.

translation.en: There. Fine. Take it apart.
I wanna help you take down Brody.
translation.fr: Je vous aide à le piéger.

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no! I just talked them out of it.
"Cleaning the outhouses."
Sounds like a Tower Two job to me.
translation.fr: C'est pour la Tour Deux, ça.

translation.en: What the...
Help me!
[yells] There's dog poo in my hair!
translation.fr: J'ai du caca dans les cheveux !

translation.en: [sobbing] Things like this don't happen to Brody!
translation.fr:
Ça n'arrive jamais à Brody,
ce genre de choses !

translation.en: -Whoa! -[Brody] Help me!
Yes, it worked!
Uh, which is very bad.
Wait! No, Tyler! We didn't untie the net!
translation.fr:
Attends, Tyler !
On n'a pas détaché le filet !

translation.en: [Brody] Help!
What's going on? [screaming]
Help me!
Oh, no!
[Brody] Oh, I can see my tower from up here.
[Brody] Ow, my boat key.
[gasps] What did you guys do?
Nothing! I thought we agreed we weren't gonna pull the prank.
translation.fr: Rien ! On devait annuler la farce !

translation.en: Why'd you make it so dangerous?
-That's what I said. -It was Lizzie's idea.
translation.fr:
- Je l'avais dit.
- C'est l'idée de Lizzie.

translation.en: -Which worked beautifully, by the way. -[Dylan] Enough!
translation.fr:
- Et ça a bien marché.
- Ça suffit !

translation.en: You guys have been ignoring me all day, and that ends now!
translation.fr:
Vous m'ignorez depuis le début
et ça suffit.

translation.en: I'm the captain.
You're gonna do what I say, how I say it, when I say it.
translation.fr:
Vous devez m'obéir au doigt et à l'œil.
Ça vous pose problème ?

translation.en: -You got a problem with that? -No.
translation.fr:
Vous devez m'obéir au doigt et à l'œil.
Ça vous pose problème ?  Non.

translation.en: No what?
No, Captain!
Tyler, Gina, we need something in case he falls.
translation.fr: Tyler, Gina, prévoyez un truc s'il tombe.

translation.en: Lizzie, Eric, grab some rappelling gear and meet me at the Polaris.
translation.fr:
Lizzie, Eric,
trouvez une corde de varappe.

translation.en: [Dylan] Come on, guys, let's go!
Once I hook the net, pull him up with the winch.
[Brody] Why is this happening? Help me! Help me!
translation.fr: C'est quoi, ce merdier ! À l'aide !

translation.en: Help!
Ow!
Brody, calm down, we're gonna save you.
translation.fr: Du calme, on va te sauver.

translation.en: You're running this rescue? Oh, great. I'm dead.
translation.fr: Tu diriges ce sauvetage ? Super, je suis mort.

translation.en: -[groans] -Will you stop? I got this.
[shouting] Please! Someone!
Anybody else!
[crying] Tower Two is the worst!
translation.fr: La Tour Deux, c'est des nazes !

translation.en: [yells] What are you doing?
You're gonna leave us alone for the rest of the summer.
translation.fr: Tu nous ficheras la paix cet été.

translation.en: No, I'm not!
Whoa! Wait, wait, what are you doing? Are you crazy?
-Stop it! -I will.
If you stop giving us bad assignments. It has to be fair from now on.
translation.fr: Si on a plus de missions pourries. Plus d'injustice.

translation.en: But I want to ruin your summer.
translation.fr: Mais je veux vous gâcher l'été.

translation.en: -[Dylan grunts] -[Brody] Okay, fine, fine!
Fine! I'll stop, I'll stop. Just please...
Please get me out of here. [groans]
-[screams] -Get ready to pull him up!
Never mind!
[panting] I can't believe... we blew that up... by mouth.
translation.fr: J'hallucine qu'on ait gonflé ce truc... à la bouche.

translation.en: -Why isn't there a pump for this thing? -[panting] There is.
translation.fr: Y a pas de pompe ? Si.

translation.en: -[Brody grunting] -We just don't have... an extension cord.
translation.fr: Mais on n'a pas... de rallonge.

translation.en: [shouting] She cut the rope! She's insane!
translation.fr: Elle a coupé la corde ! Elle est folle !

translation.en: She cut the rope!
Who does that?
-[whistle jangles] -Ow! I fell on my whistle.
translation.fr: Je suis tombé sur mon sifflet.

translation.en: Yo, Dylan, I can't believe you dropped him. That was hardcore.
translation.fr:
Dylan, tu l'as laissé tomber,
c'est dingue !

translation.en: You are crazy.
No, she's crazy.
Still don't hear it.
Come on.
That was a surprisingly baller move.
Well, I'm a surprisingly baller lady. [laughs]
translation.fr: Il ne faut pas se fier aux apparences !

translation.en: Don't worry. I won't tell them it was an accident. Thanks. They're totally worshiping me right now.
translation.fr:
- Je dirai pas que c'était un accident.
- Merci. Ils me vénèrent, là.

translation.en: Hey, Dylan.
You're right. You're our captain, and maybe...
translation.fr: Tu as raison. Tu es notre capitaine et...

translation.en: there's kind of a possibility that... I should have listened to you today.
translation.fr:
je reconnais éventuellement que...
j'aurais dû t'écouter.

translation.en: Is there anything you wanna say to me?
translation.fr: Tu as quelque chose à dire ?

translation.en: I agree. You should've listened to me.
translation.fr:
Je suis d'accord.
Tu aurais dû m'écouter.

translation.en: Come on, let's finish our assignments.
Uh, I'm not going near those swim fins. An octopus peed on me today.
translation.fr:
Je touche pas aux palmes.
Une pieuvre m'a pissé dessus.

translation.en: Please tell me you washed your hands.
translation.fr: Dis-moi que tu t'es lavée les mains.

translation.en: I did not.
Hope you don't mind. I gotta make a quick stop
at Adam Schwartzman's bar mitzvah before I take you guys home.
translation.fr:
à la bar mitzvah de Adam Schwartzman
sur la route.

translation.en: I'm Adam.
Today I became a man.
Put that arm around me, and you won't be one for long.
translation.fr:
Pas pour longtemps
si tu vires pas ton bras.

translation.en: [Vooch] Hey, guys.
Does anyone know where we're going? I'm not lost.
translation.fr: Vous savez où on va ? Je suis pas perdu.

translation.en: -But I might be. -[engine sputtering]
♪ I was gonna be that one in a million ♪
